item.description:
Introducing the Business Plan Hot-Seat: featuring Vology Corporation.

Come and hear the business plan presentation for this exciting new company.

Challenge the founders' assumptions and ask the tough questions! That's why they call it the Hot Seat!

Analyze the Investment Opportunity and Discover a business with a vision:

Vology Corporation is the product of four young and hungry entrepreneurs aligned with the same goal. Our goal is to build the best custom computers in the world. The four founders have diverse backgrounds, but one passion. We have devoted all of our resources into making Vology the best custom computer company in the world. We will not compete with Dell or HP in the standard PC market. We will stand alone as the sole company that can integrate the best components with an innovative cooling system and custom design. Our customers define our product, and we redefine high-performance custom computing

When: 6-8pm
item.name: BUSINESS PLAN HOT SEAT: VOLOGY CORPORATION
